name: lyf Sukhumvit 8 Bangkok
detail: Will definitely choose the hotel the next time I come back.

name: Hilton Bangkok Asoke
detail: it was our 4th stay at this hotel. as earlier requested, we were accomodated to the same room in which we stayed before smoothly. among many 5 star hotels in bangkok we have stayed,we believe this hotel is located at the most convenient place and best cost performance. their christmas decolation was beautiful too. only one negative experience was that it was not well explained in japanese welcome letter that they charge for guest from outside to use executive lounge during cocktail hour.it only says we can invite one outside guest to the lounge. and it was explained unfriendly when we brought the guest there. so, we ended up to pay 250thb for one bottle of not-cold-enough beer for our guest which we found a bit expensive. else, we did like everything and definitely come back again.

name: Grande Centre Point Sukhumvit 55 Thong Lo
detail: This hotel is a 'real' 5 star hotel. I've stayed in three 5 star hotels in Bangkok prior to Grand Centre Point. This beats them all. The staff are fun and consistently polite to guests. They play with the children interact with the guests and add a nice feel to the hotel. Breakfast had flavourful, good quality produce which was great for 320baht if you don't include breakfast in your booking. The design of the hotel is stylish and modern plus the view from our 26th floor room was amazing. You could see Bangkok for miles. head to the pool with a glass barrier around the outside where Bangkok can be seen... as well as heard quite well! One problem with it was the gym it was a little empty however you don't really spend your time in a gym! One last problem was the Spa area. I really wanted to just go inside and see it before I booked anything however this was prohibited. Even when no one is using it you still can't have a look with a member of staff.

name: ASAI Bangkok Chinatown
detail: The location is superb, just next to subway station, and the few lower floors of the building are retail shops and restaurants. Beautiful design hotel, comfortable, brand new, and kindly assisted staffs. There was no buffet breakfast on the day we stayed as was not much guests, but the a la carte dishes were quality and compromised. There was no amenity kits in the room.

name: Mercure Bangkok Sukhumvit 11
detail: Pros: 1. Super fast check in and check out (done in less than 10 minutes) 2. Spacious room for 2 adults and a kid with a 2-seats comfy sofa, work desk and chair, enough pillows and large bed! 3. Right in the middle of hustling soi 11, but rooms are quiet. You only feel it once you get out on the streets. 4. Accommodated all special requests made while booking. 5. Housekeeping was on point! Even organized our clothes that were left all around dangling. 6. Didn‚Äôt dine in so can‚Äôt review about the food 7. Large window with a city view and sunlight (rare find in this area) 8. Enough lighting, large mirror in the room, comparatively small but functional bathroom, necessary amenities were presented and refilled 9. Pool is nice and big 10. Very Helpful staff, called rides for us everyday within 5 minutes, helped as requested for other services. Cons: 1. No iron and iron board in the room as default option 2. Plenty of TV channels but mostly news and sports channels, only two options for kids and a few movie and documentary/lifestyle channels. No music channel. My kid felt bored. 3. Location, service and amenities- no complaints rather outstanding. But price seems a little higher for rooms if compared to other similar hotels nearby. 4. Bed mattress was too soft. Won‚Äôt bother you unless you‚Äôve back problems like neck pain, spondylitis or backpain or used to ergonomic sleeping materials or is prone to body aches due to sleeping posture. Overall we‚Äôre super happy with their hospitality. Our 4 nights stay was great. Hope to return to this one sometime soon as Bangkok is a frequent destination for me.

name: Suvarnabhumi Ville Airport Hotel
detail: We booked this hotel as our last night in Thailand and as it was near to the airport. Great place and still close enough to jump in a taxi to visit more central locations in Bangkok. Great staff, friendly, kind and helpful. Beautiful restaurant on the roof top, we only had drinks but the food looked amazing.

name: Aira Hotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 11
detail: I love this place and staff will deffently stay here again.

name: The Quarter Silom by UHG
detail: Me and my GF decided to change the hotels everyday while we were visiting Bangkok. After we came to the Quater Silom we stopped moving to the other places. Really great place with a perfect location and kind staff. Would come and stay here again! Thanks to the management and to everyone who make this place to be as it is! üôè

name: Grand Howard Hotel
detail: My son (15), my two daughters (12 and 9) and me stayed at the Grand Howard Hotel for nine nights. It was our first stay in Asia (even our first stay outside of Europe). The staff of the Grand Howard Hotel was very welcoming. The hotelroom was big, clean and had all comfort you need. We had a corner room in the 17th floor and could enjoy a spectacular view of Bangkok because of the very big windows. My children especially enjoyed the big swimming pool in the 6th floor. Part of it is roofed (protected from the sun) so you can use it at all day times. But the most we loved the staff of the hotel. They gave us good advice about what to see in Bangkok and they gave us a warm welcome every time when we returned to the hotel. We felt like being home. Thanks a lot to the staff of the Grand Howard Hotel!

name: Akara Hotel Bangkok
detail: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights while in Bangkok. The rooms are absolutely BEAUTIFUL, marble everything, great shower, nice tub for baths, free bath bombs, great feeling sheets. You definitely feel like your staying in luxury, but for such a reasonable price! The staff is very attentive and will rush to open the door for you when they see you coming back, carry all your suitcases for you, etc. For the price I don‚Äôt think you will be able to find another hotel in Bangkok that offers this much. The breakfast buffet was amazing, they had a western side and Asian side. In the afternoons they serve snacks available to the guests for free from 2pm-5pm which was nice. I would absolutely stay in this hotel again if I come back to Bangkok!
